title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 79-4.10 - Professional study of polysomnographic technology
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 79-4.10 - Professional study of polysomnographic technology

State Regulations

To meet the professional education requirement for
authorization as a polysomnographic technologist in this State, the applicant
shall present evidence of: (a) completion of an associate or higher degree in polysomnographic technology: (1)
in a program registered by the
department; or
(2)
in a program
determined by the department to be substantially equivalent to a registered
program; or
(b) completion of a course of study which is substantially equivalent to a program
determined to be acceptable pursuant to subdivision (a) of this section and
which is satisfactory to the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
79-4.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
